amendatorysection.catchline: Board of trustees; accept gifts and devises; carry out conditions.
amendatorysection.para: The board of trustees of such facility or facilities as provided by section 23-3501 shall have power to accept gifts, devises, and bequests of real and personal property to carry out the purposes for which such board was established and, to the extent of the powers conferred upon such board by sections 23-3501 to 23-3509, to execute and carry out such conditions as may be annexed to any gift, devise, or bequest.
